title: Courageously remove the non-lazy item evaluation code
body:
There's a poor man's escape hatch to disable lazy item evaluation: https://github.com/Microsoft/msbuild/blob/xplat/src/XMakeBuildEngine/Evaluation/Evaluator.cs#L814-L815

Post VS release, we should maybe look into making the lazy eval default and delete all code downstream of it since the lazy eval code copy pasted it into its own logic.
